ygData.subject: Re: anyone want to help with a film?
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations! That sounds like a fun idea. Good luck with it. ... Brangvyne ... characters, ... players, ... our
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations!

That sounds like a fun idea.

Good luck with it.

:o)
Brangvyne

--- In EQ_women@y..., "eqdocfilm" <eqdocfilm@y...> wrote:
> Greetings. My colleague and I are making a documentary about the
> phenomenon of Everquest. We have have become fascinated with all
> aspects of the game. The role-playing, the building up of
characters,
> the economy of the game, the way people interact online, etc... We
> hope to explore all these areas of the game by interviewing
players,
> spouses, children, parents and even the EQ developers.
>
> We plan on shooting over the next couple of months. We live in Los
> Angeles and are prepared to travel around the country to conduct
our
> interviews.
>
> If interested, pease reply to our email eqdocfilm<at>yahoo<dot>com
> and provide us with your age and location (city/state), level and
> guild affiliation, and how long you've been playing the game.
>
> Regards,
> Nina and Andy
